name: Lost in Space (itch) (Lukas Green)
description:
The astronaut is trying to find his way home. Help him by solving the colorful puzzle and reaching the portals.

The crates change colors when you shoot them - or when a red one explodes.

Green - normal crate, you can walk on it

Blue - "magnetic" crate, you will remain stuck on it

Yellow - "repulsion" crate, you will bounce on it

Red - dangerous crate, you will die when you touch it

Commands:

Move - arrow keys left/right

Jump - space/z

Shoot - x

Pause - ESC

F - fullscreen
